author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The Witcher 3 maybe 10 years old, but that's not stopping the rumor mill from suggesting new DLC is on the way. Via IGN Poland, sources have apparently been aware of plans to drop a new expansion featuring the desert region Zerrikania. CD Projekt Red has not confirmed anything, but they have reportedly been dropping hints. In other news, Nintendo has revealed a new set of Joy-Con 2 dropping at the same time as the new Mario Tennis Fever game. "Light Green" and "Light Purple" will retail as a pair for $100. And finally, a new Xbox Developer Direct is dropping on January 22, and will give us first gameplay of Forza Horizon 6 and a fresh look at the Fable reboot.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Witcher 3's Rumored Third Expansion Will Explore New Desert Location - IGN Daily Fix

Players can get their first look at Alex, The Man With No Allies, who's making his way to the fight. Alex comes to Street Fighter 6 in Early Spring 2026 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Want easy rewards in Arc Raiders? Weekly Trials are one of the best ways to stack extra loot and seasonal rank progress just by playing smart. In this guide, we break down the Weekly Trials for January 5–11, 2026, including Damage Snitches, throwing snowballs at Bastions, damaging Bastions, searching Supply Drops, and harvesting plants. We’ll show you where to go, what to prioritize, and the fastest ways to knock these challenges out so you can spend less time grinding and more time extracting safely.

This Arc Raiders Weekly Trials guide covers all objectives for the January 5–11, 2026 rotation, with tips for completing each trial efficiently. Learn how to find and damage Snitches, where to throw snowballs at Bastions during Cold Snap maps, how to farm Bastion damage, call in and loot Supply Drops, and harvest the correct plants for progress. Whether you’re looking to earn easy rewards, boost seasonal ranks, or optimize your weekly trial runs, this Arc Raiders guide breaks down every
title: Arc Raiders Weekly Trials Guide (Jan 5–11, 2026) – Fastest Way to Get Easy Rewards

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Gameplay Overview Trailer for ExeKiller, a first-person retro futuristic sci-fi Western shooter developed by Paradark Studio. Players can get the rundown on the gameplay mechanics, features, and systems to interact with as Denzel Fenix, a licensed bounty hunter working for the powerful Helion Corporation. Manage inventory and equipment through harsh sandstorms and extreme weather on a quest to track down fugitives scattered in the brutal wasteland. Make use of cybernetic implants to uncover hidden items, weave narrative threads together, and survive the wild, wild West. ExeKiller is coming soon to PC (Steam), with an eventual release on consoles.

#IGN #Gaming
title: ExeKiller - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gameplay Trailer for Erosion, a twin-stick Western open-world action roguelike shooter developed by Plot Twist. Players will embark on a treacherous quest to save their daughter through a quest that will cost time upon death, aging the daughter in the process. Attain new weapons, master new abilities, and save your precious daughter before time slips from your control. Erosion is coming soon to PC (Steam and Xbox on PC), with a playtest launching in Spring 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Erosion - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
John Cena is back, fueling his two biggest passions: cars and connecting with people. This season, singer and rapper Saweetie, WWE champion Charlotte Flair, country superstar Kane Brown, and future baseball hall of famer Mookie Betts join John in the driver’s seat. John spends time with each of these successful and talented celebrities, talking about their journey and discovering what drives them—both on the road and in their hearts.

#IGN
title: What Drives You with John Cena: Season 2 - Official Trailer (2026)

author: IGN
description: We got to talk to NVIDIA about their new DLSS 4.5 and G-Sync Pulsar and got hands on with the new tech at CES 2026 in Las Vegas. NVIDIA DLSS was a big topic this year at CES and comparing DLSS 4.5 vs 4 is something that will be focused on as it rolls out more widely. Gaming monitors at CES is always a popular topic so being able to see G-sync Pulsar in person was a must. For all the best gaming tech at CES 2026 and more, keep it locked to IGN.
title: How NVIDIA's New Tech Delivers Unrivaled Motion Clarity at High Frame Rates - CES 2026

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Official Trailer for Hellfire, an action thriller film distributed by Saban Films. A single man seeking justice in a broken town in Hellfire, releasing on Digital and VOD on February 17.

A haunted ex–Green Beret drifter wanders into a Southern town ruled by a ruthless crime boss and a corrupt sheriff. When violence erupts, the Man wages a one-man war for justice, redemption, and the soul of a broken town.

Hellfire stars Stephen Lang, Dolph Lundgren, Michael Sirow, Chris Mullinax, Harvey Keitel, and more. The film is directed by Isaac Florentine, written by Richard Lowry, and produced by Isaac Florentine, Johnny Remo, Sasha Yelaun p.g.a, Robert Paschall Jr. p.g.a.

Hellfire is releasing on Digital and VOD on February 17.
title: Hellfire - Official Trailer (2026) Stephen Lang, Harvey Keitel, Johnny Yong Bosch

description:
Watch the Announcement Trailer for Moto Rush Reborn, an action arcade retro-futuristic motorcycle game developed by Baltoro Games. Players will take to the neon-lit streets of Tokyo with speed and grace. Cut up in traffic while taking on missions on a variety of tracks with a demon-possessed engine on a bike hell-bent on speed and nothing else. Moto Rush Reborn is coming soon to Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Moto Rush Reborn - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
JUJUTSU KAISEN The Culling Game is available now on Crunchyroll!

Yuji Itadori is a boy with tremendous physical strength, though he lives a completely ordinary high school life. One day, to save a classmate who has been attacked by curses, he eats the finger of Ryomen Sukuna, taking the curse into his own soul. From then on, he shares one body with Ryomen Sukuna. Guided by the most powerful of sorcerers, Satoru Gojo, Itadori is admitted to Tokyo Jujutsu High School, an organization that fights the curses... and thus begins the heroic tale of a boy who became a curse to exorcise a curse, a life from which he could never turn back.

#IGN #Anime
title: JUJUTSU KAISEN The Culling Game - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
TRIGUN STARGAZE is coming to Crunchyroll January 2026! 
Vash the Stampede’s a joyful gunslinging pacifist, so why does he have a $6 million bounty on his head? That’s what’s puzzling rookie reporter Meryl Stryfe and her jaded veteran partner when looking into the vigilante only to find someone who hates blood. But their investigation turns out to uncover something heinous—his evil twin brother, Millions Knives.

#IGN #Anime
title: Trigun Stargaze - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Set in a once-thriving world reduced to ash by nuclear holocaust and generations of planetary wars, HUXLEY imagines a future where the last surviving A.I. breeds and clones elite humans, armored warriors known as Ronin, to serve as workers, soldiers, and enforcers. Max and Kai, whose lives become permanently intertwined after a routine mission leads them to discover an ancient sentient robot named Huxley. This encounter propels them into a galactic mystery, gradually revealing Huxley’s true purpose and the larger forces shaping humanity’s survival.
Collecting all six issues of the groundbreaking saga into a single paperback volume, HUXLEY also features a gallery of original digital issue covers and an extensive selection of development artwork.
title: HUXLEY - Official Graphic Novel Trailer

Players will make use of communication, strategic positioning, and more to win round after round for the glory. Choose different gameplay styles tailored to each class and gadgets to gain the edge over the opposition. PUBG: Blindspot is launching into Early Access on February 5 for PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Official Trailer for Undertone, a sci-fi psychological thriller film distributed by A24. A podcast host becomes haunted by audio recordings in Undertone, in theaters on March 13.

Undertone follows the host of an 'all-things-creepy' podcast, who moves into her dying mother's house to be her primary caregiver. When her podcast is sent 10 audio recordings of a young pregnant couple experiencing paranormal noises, she realizes the woman's story is a mirror of her own, and each new recording scratches at her sanity, drawing her into a fate she cannot escape.

Undertone stars Nina Kiri, Kris Holden-Ried, Michele Duquet, Keana Lyn Bastidas, Sarah Beaudin, and more. The film is directed and written by Ian Tuason.

Undertone is in theaters on March 13.

#IGN #Undertone #Horror
title: Undertone - Official Trailer (2026) Nina Kiri, Kris Holden-Ried, Michele Duquet

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Overview Trailer for Mario Tennis Fever, a brand-new arcade tennis game developed by Nintendo. Players can use 38 playable characters on the court with a plethora of Fever Rackets to choose from, offering diverse effects to use in-game. New defensive maneuvers allow for increased depth of strategy, and a variety of game modes are available at launch, from Adventure mode, local play, and online play with a Nintendo Switch Online subscription. Mario Tennis Fever launches on February 12 for Nintendo Switch 2.

#MarioTennisFever #Gaming #IGN
title: Mario Tennis Fever Overview Trailer - Is This the Ultimate Mario Tennis Game?

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Wanderer Test' Gameplay Trailer for Sea of Remnants, an upcoming action-adventure open-world pirate game developed by Joker Studio. 

Players will brave the open seas to grow their fleet, combat deep-sea monsters of all manner, and decide the fate of the pirate city of Orbtopia one voyage at a time. 

Get hands-on with Sea of Remnants during the upcoming Wanderer Test running from February 5 through February 12 on PC. Sea of Remnants launches on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam) in 2026.

#IGN #SeaOfRemnants #ActionAdventure
title: Sea of Remnants - Official 'Wanderer Test' Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Official Trailer for The Wrecking Crew, a comedic action movie distributed by Amazon MGM Studios. Half brothers get brought back together after a family tragedy in The Wrecking Crew, streaming on January 28 exclusively on Amazon Prime Video.

Estranged half-brothers Jonny and James reunite after their father's mysterious death. As they search for the truth, buried secrets reveal a conspiracy threatening to tear their family apart.

The Wrecking Crew stars Dave Bautista, Jason Momoa, Claes Bang, Temuera Morrison, Jacob Batalon, Frankie Adams, and more. The film is directed by Angel Manuel Soto and written by Jonathan Tropper.

The Wrecking Crew is streaming on January 28 exclusively on Amazon Prime Video.

#IGN #WreckingCrew #AmazonPrime
title: The Wrecking Crew - Official Trailer (2026) Dave Bautista, Jason Momoa, Temuera Morrison

author: IGN
description: Check out the Demo Launch Trailer for Dragon Khan, a third-person action hack-and-slash RPG developed by Evolution Game Studio. Players will explore a world ruled by dragons as Botu, a green dragon born with wings. Take flight, harness powerful elemental abilities, and seek the whereabouts of the Dragon Khan against the backdrop of an invasion. Dragon Khan is coming soon to PC (Steam), with a demo available now on Steam.
title: Dragon Khan - Official Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the full episode of Podcast Beyond here - https://youtu.be/uA773k3uwjA?si=UqyIUCXjp7K4izQM

Now THIS is Jailbreaking! PlayStation 5 modders, hackers and tinkerers have discovered a new exploit to unlock the console with the help of a physical copy of the PS4 port of the PS2 Star Wars game, Racer Revenge. As a result, copies of the game are popping up on eBay for hundreds of dollars more than they were selling for days earlier. How did this get discovered? What does this mean for legitimate collectors of this lesser-known sequel to the N64 classic Episode 1 Racer? We don’t know. But if you have a copy, you should probably sell it before Sony patches this hole in the fence.

This weeks show is hosted by Max Scoville and Brian Altano and was produced by Nick Maillet
title: Star Wars Racer Revenge Selling For $300+ After PS5 Jailbreakers Find New Exploit - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
The Legend of Heroes: Trails Beyond the Horizon reviewed by George Yang on PS5, also available on PC, PS4, Switch, and Switch 2.

After its predecessor took a detour from advancing the Calvard saga in favor of a more interpersonal story, the Legend of Heroes: Trails Beyond the Horizon almost feels like an overcorrection as it weaves the plot-heavy stories of three different protagonists into a single adventure. However, splitting it into three distinct routes makes it all much easier to digest. While our main hero is overshadowed by the other protagonists early on, the story eventually finds a satisfying way to weave its paths together, and ultimately sticks the landing. The new mechanics in both the turn-based and real-time combat are also welcome additions that continue to refine a battle system that was already a lot of fun. And while its cliffhanger ending will likely be divisive, Trails Beyond the Horizon has certainly built an exciting launchpad for what comes next.
title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails Beyond the Horizon Review

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
A website featuring an interactive map of the settings from the Fallout live-action series has fans hoping a remake announcement is coming soon. The map features a timer that seems to line up with the finale of Fallout Season 2, but with evidence already out there that a Fallout 3 remake is in the works, fans are hoping this leads to an official announcement, or maybe even a remake/remaster of Fallout: New Vegas. In other news, games industry analysts have revealed the most-played games of 2025, and surprise surprise, it's the same list from 2024. Call of Duty, GTA V, Roblox, Minecraft, and Fortnite are the most-played games at least two years in a row. And speaking of Fornite, the South Park collab has leaked, and the gameplay features a clever way to showcase fourth-graders in the game.
title: Fans Hope Mysterious Countdown Is a Fallout 3 or New Vegas Remaster or Remake - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Gameplay Reveal Trailer for Inari, a high-speed 2D action platformer developed by 1HP Studio. Players will embody a lethal executioner in an Eastern fantasy world to dispatch the Seven Daughters who have gone against the will of the Lord. Pull off rapid combos with your trusty kunai, master the art of teleportation, and face enemy after enemy with a single life. Inari is coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Inari - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
